summary: A detailed home that creates a believable living environment for an adventurer in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/4jm73p.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[center]*IMPORTANT* When updating to V2 remove all contents from the large draugr chest upstairs as it is removed and replaced with the other one in the room[/center]

[center]Mystic Home[/center]

[center]Requires:[/center]
[center]Skyrim.esm[/center]
[center]Update.esm (1.5)[/center]

[center]Contains:[/center]
[center]Weapon Rack x 12[/center] 
[center]Weapon Plaque x 5[/center] 
[center]Weapon Display case large x 1[/center]
[center]Mannequin x 1 [/center]
[center]Alchemy station x 1[/center]
[center]Enchanting station x 1[/center]
[center]Anvil x 1[/center]
[center]Skinning rack x 1[/center]
[center]Cooking pot x 1[/center]
[center]Safe containers x 14[/center]
[center]One bed(well rested)[/center]

[center]You stumble upon an odd tower whilst exploring close by the Half-Moon Mill. It seems to be in reasonable condition and appears to of been recently cleaned inside. Although outside  a shed that contains an anvil and skinning rack appear to of gotten hardly any use and have gathered dust while the shed is starting to rot. Whoever lived here was most likely some sort of mage or atlest enjoyed literature, but you cant help wondering what fate became of the previous owner..... [/center]

[center][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/suy06u.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[center]I would say this is my most detailed home I have made so far and took me a couple of days to complete.The bottom floor is nav meshed but not tested!Constructive criticism is welcome and please notify me of any bugs!.[/center] 

[center]Extra Credit[/center]

Blary\'s - OpenBooks Resource  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14134

Oaristys - Modders Resource Pack  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16525

Tonynarko67 - PileCoin http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16482

Thanks to all of you for providing these great resources which have completed this home!

[center]INSTALL[/center]
[center]Drag meshes and texture folder into skyrim data folder as they are the modders resources and the home will not work properly if you do not do this! and drag MysticHome.esp into data also[/center]

[center]Latest update contains a better upstairs room... I also went over the nav mesh and it actually works now and followers can enter the house aswell as the basement, the static book piles can now be used as chests also to store your books. also fixed the trapdoors and they now have ladders.[/center]

[center][youtube]wP_L58S8Ng4[/youtube][/center]
author: RatFinkk
